name: Pygmy
summary: Embark on a riveting pixelated adventure with Pygmy, an Atari 2600 game that transports you to a world of tiny wonders! As a courageous pygmy explorer, navigate treacherous landscapes, battle inventive enemies, and solve mind-bending puzzles to uncover ancient secrets. With its charmingly simplistic graphics and addictive gameplay, Pygmy invites you to rediscover the joy of classic gaming. So grab your joystick and prepare for a pint-sized journey like no other!
